testcase.classname: Two cities are passed through an endpoint to see if they exist
testcase.name: Passing two cities in parameter which contains in a text file should return a yes
testcase.system-out: Given the origin city and destination city..................................passed When ConnectedController endpoint is executed with the origin city and destination city.passed Then it should return a yes to client.......................................passed

testcase.classname: Two cities are passed through an endpoint to see if they exist
testcase.name: Passing two cities in parameter which does not contain in a text file should return a no
testcase.system-out: Given the wrong origin city and destination city............................passed When ConnectedController endpoint is executed with the wrong origin city and destination city.passed Then it should return a no to client........................................passed
